entries.journal_entry_description: Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find and activate the various miner markers which are located around the mining fields.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Chu-Gon Dar ruins and activate it.
entries.task02_message_box_text: These ruins date back well into the earliest days of the Old Republic. Some experts date them from before the time of the first Sith War. Certain experts believe that this ruin was the laboratory of the great Jedi Master Chu-Gon Dar, an expert at using the force to manipulate physical objects.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the southern lava falls and activate it.
entries.task04_message_box_text: Mustafar's wealth comes entirely from its natural resources. The lava brings up rare metals and ores to the surface, where they are easily collected by the miners.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Koseyet bridge and activate it.
entries.task06_message_box_text: This natural land bridge connects the main mining fields to the Koseyet Mining Camp. The Koseyet mining camp sits on one of the richest mineral deposits on Mustafar and is heavily defended by the miners.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the destroyed mining facility and activate it.
entries.task08_message_box_text: This facility was destroyed and abandoned shortly before the end of the Clone Wars. Salvage crews who investigated the facility after its destruction found the bodies of the separatist leaders, including Viceroy Gunray, murdered by a lightsaber.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Mensix Mining Facility and activate it.
entries.task10_message_box_text: The Mensix Mining facility was built shortly after the destruction of the old mining facility. The new facility is nearly an exact replica of the old facility and most of its technology dates back to the days of the Old Republic.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: There are five markers located throughout the mining fields to the south of the Mensix Mining Facility. Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find all five of them and check the information on them.
